messages.title: Labour will stop at nothing to increase the amount of tax they take from you.
messages.content: They plan to tax your property and your assets, and prevent you from passing on what you own to your children.

messages.title: Labour’s spending plans mean an annual £2400 tax rise for every taxpayer.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Conservatives let you keep more of what you earn and all of what you own. The only way to invest in our public services is to have a strong economy. Under the Conservatives we’ve seen wages rise, taxes fall and employment reach record levels.

issues.economy: The only way to invest in our public services is to have a strong economy. Under the Conservatives we’ve seen wages rise, taxes fall and employment reach record levels.
